type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.tasks.CreateStaticLibrary
type.description: * Assembles a static library from object files.

method.name: getOutputFile
method.description: * The file where the output binary will be located.

method.name: getSource
method.description: * The source object files to be passed to the archiver.

method.name: getStaticLibArgs
method.description: * Additional arguments passed to the archiver.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: * The tool chain used for creating the static library.

method.name: source
method.description:
* Adds a set of object files to be linked.

The provided source object is evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)}.

property.name: outputFile
property.description: * The file where the output binary will be located.

property.name: source
property.description: * The source object files to be passed to the archiver.

property.name: staticLibArgs
property.description: * Additional arguments passed to the archiver.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: * The tool chain used for creating the static library.
